name: Bashful
title: Hopeless Romantic
action: <mark>OH, GOSH</mark> This character can't quest unless you have another Seven Dwarfs character in play.
flavour: Life is sweeter with friends.

name: Christopher Robin
title: Adventurer
action: <mark>WE'LL ALWAYS BE TOGETHER</mark> Whenever you ready this character, if you have 2 or more other characters in play, gain 2 lore.
flavour:
“Look, Pooh! Have you ever seen anything so grand?” 
−Christopher Robin

name: Cinderella
title: Ballroom Sensation
action: Singer 3 (This character counts as cost 3 to sing songs.)
flavour: With a magical dress and a song in her heart, she dazzled everyone at the ball.

name: Cobra Bubbles
title: Just a Social Worker
flavour: “Let me get this straight. Your ‘magic’ spell book got washed away in a flood of ‘magic’ ink?”

name: Doc
title: Leader of the Seven Dwarfs
action: <mark>SHARE AND SHARE ALIKE</mark> Whenever this character quests, you pay 1 ⬡ less for the next character you play this turn.
flavour: He’s in charge of this outfit.

name: Dopey
title: Always Playful
action: <mark>ODD ONE OUT</mark> When this character is banished, your other Seven Dwarfs characters get +2 ※ until the start of your next turn.
flavour: He's a real gem.

name: Eudora
title: Accomplished Seamstress
flavour: Love holds everything together.

name: Gaston
title: Baritone Bully
action: Singer 5 (This character counts as cost 5 to sing songs.)
flavour: No one . . . sings like Gaston!

name: Grand Duke
title: Advisor to the King
action: <mark>YES, YOUR MAJESTY</mark> Your Prince, Princess, King and Queen characters gain +1 ※.
flavour: He takes being opinionated to a higher level.

name: Grumpy
title: Bad-Tempered
action: <mark>THERE'S TROUBLE A-BREWIN'</mark> Your other Seven Dwarfs characters get +1 ※.
flavour: Sour as a green gooseberry!

name: Happy
title: Good-Natured
action: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their ※ to another chosen character's ※ this turn.)>
flavour: You couldn't pick a better friend.

name: King Louie
title: Jungle VIP
action: <mark>LAY IT ON THE LINE</mark> Whenever another character is banished, you may remove up to 2 damage from this character.
flavour: “Cool it, boy. Unwind yourself.”

name: Mickey Mouse
title: Friendly Face
action: <mark>GLAD YOU’RE HERE!</mark> Whenever this character quests, you pay 3 ⬡ less for the next character you play this turn.
flavour: “Come on in−there’s lots to explore.”

name: Mufasa
title: Betrayed Leader
action: <mark>THE SUN WILL SET</mark> When this character is banished, you may reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a character card, you may play that character for free and they enter play exerted. Otherwise, put it on the top of your deck.

name: Mulan
title: Free Spirit
action: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their ※ to another chosen character's ※ this turn.)
flavour: Everything looks better when you're free to be yourself.

name: Mulan
title: Reflecting
action:
Shift 2 (You may pay 2 ⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Mulan.)
HONOR TO THE ANCESTORS Whenever this character quests, you may reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a song card, you may play it for free. Otherwise, put it on the top of your deck.

name: Nana
title: Darling Family Pet
action: <mark>NURSEMAID</mark> Whenever you play a Floodborn character, you may remove all damage from chosen character.
flavour: Children are a dog's best friend.

name: Piglet
title: Very Small Animal
flavour: For a very small animal, he has an awfully big heart.

name: Rapunzel
title: Gifted Artist
action:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 ⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Rapunzel.)
LET YOUR POWER SHINE Whenever you remove 1 or more damage from one of your characters, you may draw a card.

name: Rapunzel
title: Sunshine
action: <mark>MAGIC HAIR</mark> ↷ − Remove up to 2 damage from chosen character.
flavour: “We can all make the world a little brighter in our own way.”

name: Sleepy
title: Nodding Off
action: <mark>YAWN!</mark> This character enters play exerted.
flavour: He never gets tired of naps.

name: Sneezy
title: Very Allergic
action: <mark>AH-CHOO!</mark> Whenever you play this character or another Seven Dwarfs character, you may give chosen character -1 ※ this turn.
flavour: Look out! He's gonna blow!

name: Snow White
title: Lost in the Forest
action: <mark>I WON'T HURT YOU</mark> When you play this character, you may remove up to 2 damage from chosen character.
flavour: “Why, you're all alone, just like me.”

name: Snow White
title: Unexpected Houseguest
action: <mark>HOW DO YOU DO?</mark> You pay 1 ⬡ less to play Seven Dwarfs characters.

title: Well Wisher

Shift 4 You may pay 4 ⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Snow White.)

name: The Queen
title: Regal Monarch
flavour: Don't question her. Don't doubt her. And above all, don't disobey her.

action: Remove up to 4 damage from chosen character.
flavour: “This might sting a little.”

Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

title: Crab

name: Merlin
title: Rabbit
action: <mark>HOPPITY HIP!</mark> When you play this character and when he leaves play, you may draw a card.

action: <mark>BATTLE OF WITS</mark> Whenever one of your other characters is returned to your hand from play, this character gets +1 ◆ this turn.

“No one can have a higher opinion of you than I have, and I think you’re a slimy, contemptible sewer rat!” 
−Basil

name: You Can Fly!
action:
(A character with cost 2 or more can ↷ to sing this song for free.)
Chosen character gains Evasive until the start of your next turn. (Only characters with Evasive can challenge them.)

name: Dinner Bell
action: <mark>YOU KNOW WHAT HAPPENS</mark> ↷, 2 ⬡ − Draw cards equal to the damage on chosen character of yours, then banish them.
flavour: The delicate sound of impending doom.

name: Peter Pan's Dagger
action: Your characters with Evasive get +1 ※.
flavour: Like so much other lore, Peter Pan's dagger was safe in the Great Illuminary until the flood.

name: Sword In The Stone
action: ↷, 2 ⬡ - Chosen character gets +1 ※ this turn for each 1 damage on them.
flavour: “Whoso pulleth out this sword of this stone and anvil is rightwise king born of England.”

title: Growing Girl
action:
GOOD ADVICE Your other characters gain Support. (Whenever they quest, you may add their ※ to another chosen character's ※ this turn.)

name: Basil
title: Great Mouse Detective
action:
Shift 5 You may pay 5 ⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Basil.)
THERE'S ALWAYS A CHANCE If you used Shift to play this character, you may draw 2 cards when he enters play.
flavour: A solution always presents itself.

name: Basil
title: Of Baker Street
action: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their ※ to another chosen character‘s ※ this turn.)
flavour: “What an ingenious device! If its light is refracted through these, then its images must resolve somewhere below.”

name: Basil
title: Perceptive Investigator
flavour: “There is no question: something is afoot in the Great Illuminary.”

name: Caterpillar
title: Calm and Collected
flavour: “Keep your tempo.”

title: Grandfather Clock

Shift 3 You may pay 3 ⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Cogsworth.)
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)

name: Cogsworth
title: Talking Clock
action: WAIT A MINUTE Your character with Reckless gain “↷ − Gain 1 lore.”
flavour: “This has gone far enough. I'm charge here.”

name: Cruella De Vil
title: Fashionable Cruiser
action: NOW GET GOING During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)
flavour: “Isn't it just gorgeous, darling? And just as stylish as I am.”

name: Cruella De Vil
title: Perfectly Wretched
action:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 ⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Cruella De Vil.)
OH, NO YOU DON'T Whenever this character quests, chosen opposing character gets -2 ※ this turn.
flavour: “It's ink couture, darling. I wear only the best!”

name: Duke Weaselton
title: Small-Time Crook
action: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)
flavour: “It’s Wee-sel-ton.”

name: Gaston
title: Intellectual Powerhouse
action:
Shift 4 You may pay 4 ⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Gaston.)
DEVELOPED BRAIN When you play this character, look at the top 3 cards of your deck. You may put one into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: Grand Pabbie
title: Oldest and Wisest
action: <mark>ANCIENT INSIGHT</mark> Whenever you remove 1 or more damage from one of your characters, gain 2 lore.
flavour: When he talks, even sky listens.

name: Hiram Flaversham
title: Toymaker
action: <mark>ARTIFICER</mark> When you play this character and whenever he quests, you may banish one of your items to draw 2 cards.
flavour: His creations are even more wondrous with the Illuminary's resources at his fingertips.

name: James
title: Role Model
action: <mark>NEVER, EVER LOSE SIGHT</mark> When this character is banished, you may put this card into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

name: Jasmine
title: Heir of Agrabah
action: <mark>I'M A FAST LEARNER</mark> When you play this character, remove up to 1 damage from chosen character of yours.
flavour: She may be young, but she’s got the spirit of a true leader.

name: Judy Hopps
title: Optimistic Officer
action: <mark>DON'T CALL ME CUTE</mark> When you play this character, you may banish chosen item. Its player draws a card.
flavour: “I'll get to the bottom of what happened with that locked lorebook. You can count on me!”

name: Mrs. Judson
title: Housekeeper
action: <mark>TIDY UP</mark> Whenever you play a Floodborn character, you may put the top card of your deck into your inkwell facedown and exerted.
flavour: “I know just the thing. Let me fetch you a pot of tea and some of my fresh cheese crumpets.“

name: Nick Wilde
title: Wily Fox
action: <mark>IT'S CALLED A HUSTLE</mark> When you play this character, you may return an item card named Pawpsicle from your discard to your hand.
flavour: “It's criminal how good these things taste!”

name: Noi
title: Orphaned Thief
action: HIDE AND SEEK While you have an item in play, this character gains Resist +1 and Ward. (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1. Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)

name: Owl
title: Logical Lecturer
flavour: “For instance, based on the quality of the light and the subtle change in wind direction, I can safely say that it is time for tea.”

name: Prince Charming
title: Heir to the Throne
flavour: He'd searched across the Inklands for the young woman who'd stolen his heart at the ball, only to find more mysteries.

name: Rabbit
title: Reluctant Host
flavour:
Pooh: “Isn’t there anybody here at all?” 
Rabbit: “Nobody!” 
Pooh: “Somebody's there . . . because somebody must have said ‘Nobody.’”

name: Sisu
title: Divine Water Dragon
action: <mark>I TRUST YOU</mark> Whenever this character quests, look at the top 2 cards of your deck. You may put one into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.
flavour: No matter her shape, you can’t mistake her heart.

name: The Nokk
title: Water Spirit
action: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)
flavour: As elusive as water.

name: Winnie The Pooh
title: Having a Think
action: <mark>HUNNY POT</mark> Whenever this character quests, you may put a card from your hand into your inkwell facedown.
flavour: When he thought, he thought in the most thoughtful way he could think.

name: Falling Down the Rabbit Hole
action: Each player chooses one of their characters and puts them into their inkwell facedown and exerted.
flavour: Down, down, down she went, floating in a swirl of ink. How curious!

name: Four Dozen Eggs
action:

action:
CAREFUL AIM ↷, 2 ⬡ – Chosen character gets -2 ※ this turn.
STAY BACK! ↷, Banish this item – Banish chosen Dragon character.

−James

name: Pawpsicle
action:
JUMBO POP When you play this item, you may draw a card.
THAT'S REDWOOD Banish this item − Remove up to 2 damage from chosen character.

name: Sardine Can
action: FLIGHT CABIN Your exerted characters gain Ward. (Opponents can’t choose them except to challenge.)
flavour:
“Flight 3759 boarding now! Let’s go get that lore!” 
–Orville

name: Beast
title: Forbidding Recluse
action: <mark>YOU'RE NOT WELCOME HERE</mark> When you play this character, you may deal 1 damage to chosen character.
flavour: Woe to the one who draws his gaze.

name: Beast
title: Selfless Protector
action: <mark>SHIELD ANOTHER</mark> Whenever one of your other characters would be dealt damage, put that many damage counters on this character instead.
flavour: “You’ll have to go through me first.”

Shift 3 (You may pay 3 ⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Beast.)

name: Benja
title: Guardian of the Dragon Gem
action: <mark>WE HAVE A CHOICE</mark> When you play this character, you may banish chosen item.
flavour: “Don’t mistake spirit for skill.”

name: Chief Bogo
title: Respected Officer
action: <mark>INSUBORDINATION!</mark> Whenever you play a Floodborn character, deal 1 damage to each opposing character.
flavour: “We can confirm the ink flood was caused by an explosion. We have it under control−now clear the area.”

title: Knight in Training
